video.title: The Glades
video.synopsis: An abrasive homicide detective moves to the Florida Everglades, but the unusually high murder rate thwarts his plans for relaxing on the golf course.

episodes.synopsis: Jim, a brilliant but hard-to-get-along-with detective, is banished from the Chicago P.D. because of an alleged dalliance with his boss's wife.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Jim Longworth takes Callie's son Jeff to a heavily wooded area to collect bugs for a school science project.
episodes.title: Bird in the Hand

episodes.synopsis: A hurricane bears down on Florida.
episodes.title: A Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: Jim is introduced to the intensely competitive world of high school football as the small town of Pahokee prepares for the annual Muck Bowl.
episodes.title: Mucked Up

episodes.synopsis: Longworth gets a nightmarish call from Daniel that Carlos has been found dead.
episodes.title: The Girlfriend Experience

episodes.synopsis: A head-trauma patient startles Callie when he says he saw a man who looked exactly like him -- his doppelganger -- commit a murder.
episodes.title: Doppelganger

episodes.synopsis: Longworth and Carlos are called to Cassadaga, founded over 100 years ago by mediums and psychics, to investigate the murder of a psychic advisor.
episodes.title: Cassadaga

episodes.synopsis: Jim Longworth's latest victim is a well-dressed burly man who appears to have been shot, stabbed and possibly poisoned.
episodes.title: Marriage Is Murder

episodes.synopsis: Jim Longworth's latest case sends him to the famed Native American-owned Blues Rock Casino, which boasts priceless rock 'n' roll memorabilia.
episodes.title: Honey

episodes.synopsis: A dead man in a swimming pool leads Longworth and Carlos to a Pompano Beach mansion, and then into the world of high-end horse breeding.
episodes.title: Second Chance

episodes.synopsis: A famed treasure hunter is murdered, and attention immediately turns to the victim's famous treasure-hunter uncle, Big Jack Hasker.
episodes.title: Booty

episodes.synopsis: Longworth is called to investigate the mysterious death of a beautiful young girl who was having an affair with a prominent Florida state senator.
episodes.title: Exposed

episodes.synopsis: A couple's golf game comes to a screeching halt when they stumble upon a dead body along the fairway.
episodes.title: Breaking 80

episodes.synopsis: The daughter of a notorious Cuban mobster turns up dead in a Little Havana alley.
episodes.title: Family Matters

episodes.synopsis: Detective Samantha Harper tracks a serial killer from Chicago to Florida, where she and Longworth team up to find the killer before he strikes again.
episodes.title: Old Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: A hunt for fireflies turns gruesome when an 8-year-old's slumber party turns into a crime scene.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: A 12-year-old's joyride comes to a halt and sets off a murder investigation when a body is found in the trunk of the car she was driving.
episodes.title: Moonlighting

episodes.synopsis: A man is found beaten to death in a truck stop restroom. Meanwhile, Jeff is angry he can't see his dad for another three months.
episodes.title: Dirty Little Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Jim investigates a murder in Gibtown, a community populated by the descendents of human sideshow oddities -- and everyone is a suspect.
episodes.title: Gibtown

episodes.synopsis: Things are not as they seem when Jim and the crew investigate the murder of a beloved Haitian doctor.
episodes.title: Addicted to Love

episodes.synopsis: A man is found dead in a church lying face-down in a box full of poisonous snakes.
episodes.title: Second Skin

episodes.synopsis: A popular high school teacher and soccer coach is found shot to death under the bleachers at school.
episodes.title: Iron Pipeline

episodes.synopsis: When body parts of a Coast Guard reservist are found in the belly of a poached wild boar, Longworth hunts the killer into the depths of the Glades.
episodes.title: Swamp Thing

episodes.synopsis: A man's body is found at a popular bar with a large diamond ring in his pocket. Longworth uncovers a love triangle that may have ended in murder.
episodes.title: Beached

episodes.synopsis: An Ernest Hemingway lookalike is discovered with a bullet hole in his head. The victim might have gotten caught in the middle of a family feud.
episodes.title: Shine

episodes.synopsis: In the thrilling season finale, Callie's hospital is on lockdown when a pair of ex-con brothers takes hostages.
episodes.title: Breakout

episodes.synopsis: Jim and Carlos are accused of concealing an alien abduction when they probe the death of a millionaire who left his fortune to a group of UFO buffs.
episodes.title: Close Encounters

episodes.synopsis: A swimmer in a mermaid costume washes ashore dead, and the clues lead Jim to a hip-hop mogul trying to turn a mermaid show into a lucrative spectacle.
episodes.title: Poseidon Adventure

episodes.synopsis: While Jim helps Callie settle into her new apartment in Atlanta, Carlos performs a guest autopsy for Daniel's forensics class at Tampa Tech.
episodes.title: Longworth's Anatomy

episodes.synopsis: The dead body of a naked woman leads Jim and Carlos to investigate a nudist colony fighting the expansion of a luxury condominium development.
episodes.title: The Naked Truth

episodes.synopsis: After finding the owner of his favorite food truck dead, Jim ends up embroiled in a heated political battle between restaurateurs.
episodes.title: Food Fight

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a woman who tried to exonerate a death-row inmate forces Jim to team with the detective who first investigated the case: his ex-partner.
episodes.title: Old Times

episodes.synopsis: Jim and Jennifer investigate a murder that puts them at odds with a bizarre antigovernment group who consider themselves above the law.
episodes.title: Public Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Jim and Jennifer discover the high cost of looking young and beautiful when the co-owner of a posh medical spa turns up dead.
episodes.title: Fountain of Youth

episodes.synopsis: When a lottery winner is found murdered on a remote island, Jim and Jennifer must get to the bottom of a decade-long personal vendetta.
episodes.title: Islandia

episodes.synopsis: On the day of Callie's board exam, Jim must solve the murder of a businesswoman who was about to offer an endorsement deal to a young surfing champ.
episodes.title: Endless Summer

episodes.synopsis: Longworth must delve into a 150-year-old ghost story to solve a murder when the dead body of an heiress is found in a haunted plantation house.
episodes.title: Yankee Dan

episodes.synopsis: The murder of the spokesmodel for a prominent rum brand sends Jim into the sexy, cutthroat world of liquor promotion to find the killer.
episodes.title: Shot Girls

episodes.synopsis: While Jim searches for the killer who smoked the owner of a vast BBQ empire, Daniel enters a BBQ competition with his brother, Drew.
episodes.title: Killer Barbecue

episodes.synopsis: The death of a male stripper forces Jim to seek out Florida's purveyors of flesh and the women who love them.
episodes.title: Magic Longworth

episodes.synopsis: After a dead body disappears from a crime scene at a 10K run, Jim unravels a nefarious plot to discover how a corpse can just get up and walk away.
episodes.title: Apocalypse Now

episodes.synopsis: When the vice president of a local bank is found dead in the vault, Jim discovers her tattoo and bruises reveal a double life.
episodes.title: Glade-iators!

episodes.synopsis: What appears to be a ritualistic murder leads Jim to investigate the secret world of Florida's gypsies just as he gets an unexpected visitor
episodes.title: Gypsies, Tramps and Thieves

episodes.synopsis: While Jim unravels a three-way polyamorous relationship tied to a murder, Michael drops a piece of news that blindsides Jim.
episodes.title: Three's Company

episodes.synopsis: The murder of the first female professional Jai Alai player leads Jim to investigate the multimillion-dollar gambling industry in Florida.
episodes.title: Fast Ball

episodes.synopsis: Jim investigates the death of a billionaire oil tycoon and art collector on the eve of Art Basel, Miami's international art show.
episodes.title: Gallerinas

episodes.synopsis: When a man is killed by a Civil War reenactor's sword, Jim must enter the fray to find which imaginary soldier committed a very real murder.
episodes.title: Civil War

episodes.synopsis: Jim gets roped into a long-standing family feud among Florida ranchers when a ranch hand turns up dead between the two families' properties.
episodes.title: Happy Trails

episodes.synopsis: Jim gets called back to the golf course to catch the murderer of a golf hustler, but he's handicapped by a mad scramble.
episodes.title: Tin Cup
